data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 6,200 souls in Riga and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Riga, Latvia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Riga.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Riga, Latvia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 5,743 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Riga, Latvia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Azerbaijani people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, make bold the prophets in Riga, Latvia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Riga, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.section_summary:
the state of Riga, Latvia has a population of 6,200.

We estimate Riga has 456 people who might know Jesus, 3,272 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,471 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 456 believers in Riga that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
